column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Iroh says : " May I have this game ? "
#Text=Fung says : " The guest has the first move .
#Text=" Fung says : " Then let us play .
#Text=" Fung says : " Welcome , brother .
#Text=The White Lotus opens wide to those who know her secrets .
#Text=" Zuko says : " What are you old gasbags talking about ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " I always tried to tell you that Pai Sho is more than just a game .
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " I 'm not waiting all night for these geezers to finish yapping !
#Text=It 's over !
#Text=You two fugitives are coming with me !
#Text=" Fung says : " I knew it !
#Text=You two are wanted criminals with a giant bounty on your heads !
#Text=" Zuko says : " I thought you said he would help !
#Text=" Iroh says : " He is .
#Text=Just watch .
#Text=" Fung says : " You think you 're going to capture them and collect all that gold ?
#Text=" Man in the bar says : " Gold ?
#Text=" Yu says : " Uh ... Maybe we should n't .
#Text="
